snippet: In a House chamber filled conspicuously with the victims of gun violence, Ted Nugent seemed like a provocation, a saber-toothed tiger invited to a garden party.
abstract: Republicans appearing at Pres Obama's State of the Union address attempt to evince a more positive and less strident attitude; shift is undercut by the presence of gun advocate Ted Nugent, who remains stone-faced even amid emotional tribute to victims of gun violence.

byline.contributor: Ashley Parker and Jeremy Peters contributed reporting.

lead_paragraph: In a House chamber filled conspicuously with the victims of gun violence, Ted Nugent seemed like a provocation, a saber-toothed tiger invited to a garden party.

headline.seo: G.O.P. Aims for a Calmer Face, Except Maybe for Ted Nugent
headline.main: G.O.P. Puts On a Calmer Face, Except for One Wild-Eyed Rocker
headline.print_headline: G.O.P. Puts On a Calmer Face, Except for One Wild-Eyed Rocker
